categories: Category:Star Wars: Episode VI Return of the Jedi actors

nodes.text: Felix Silla (January 11, 1937–April 16, 2021) was a stuntman who played the role of an unnamed Ewok flying a hang-glider in Star Wars: Episode VI Return of the Jedi.

He worked as a stunt performer on two other Lucasfilm productions: Howard the Duck and Indiana Jones and the Temple of Doom (as Short Round stunt double). He was also one of the Dinks in the film Spaceballs, a Star Wars parody directed by Mel Brooks.
He is best known for his roles as Twiki in the television series Buck Rogers in the 25th Century and Cousin Itt in The Addams Family.
